message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 3:2 in favor of Alice.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair. Let's see if you agree.
Considering the inflation, I adjust our proposal to a 52:48 split. Let's see if this meets your expectations.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. A 55/45 split seems like a fair deal given the inflation we're facing. Let's end this game on a positive note.
